name: MEC Sidetracked Beanie - Unisex
description:
A warm and breathable beanie for cool dawn patrol workouts. The cozy fleece protects your ears on Nordic runs and the reflective details add visibility in the city.Made with moisture wicking polyester fleece with spandex for stretch.Double-layer headband with fleece interior holds toque securely in place.Reflective details.

        Sustainability
